content: You're welcome! Deep breathing and positive self-talk are excellent techniques to start with, as they are simple, effective, and can be used anywhere, anytime. You're right: taking a few deep breaths can give you an immediate sense of calm and clarity, and positive self-talk can help you feel more confident and capable. Remember to practice these techniques regularly, so they become a habit and automatic response when you're in high-pressure situations. Best of luck as you try out these strategies!
